DOC.brief_summary: This study comparison Clobetasol Propionate Spray Clobetasol Propionate Ointment Regard Efficacy , Safety , Subject Satisfaction Duration Response Moderate Severe Stable Plaque Psoriasis . Subjects enrol randomized one two group : clobetasol propionate Spray 4 week treatment clobetasol propionate ointment 2 week treatment 2 week follow-up visit group .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy/Safety/Subject Satisfaction/Duration Response Clobetasol Propionate Spray v Ointment Plaque Psoriasis
